alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 2:54AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Franklin County through 330 AM CDT... At 254 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Cass to Wiederkehr Village to 3 miles southwest of Denning. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Ozark... Altus... Denning... Wiederkehr Village... Alix... Barnes... Watalula... Meg... Paradise... Etna... This includes Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 34 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
